headline: Uber (UBER): Assessing Valuation After Recent Momentum Shift and 3-Month Pullback
summary: Uber Technologies (UBER) shares edged up about 1% in the latest session. Investors may be taking note of its steady revenue growth over the past year, even as the stock has slipped 13% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Uber Technologies. After posting an impressive year-to-date share price return of nearly 33%, Uber is finally taking a breather as momentum fades and the stock has dipped 13% over the past three months. Still, long-term investors have seen strong 1-year total...
